data.title: Byron Cook on LinkedIn: If you're interested in doing RTL formal verification and/or formal…
data.meta_description: If you're interested in doing RTL formal verification and/or formal reasoning about hardware-level stuff (e.g. cross-chip or chip-to-chip communication… | 70 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
"Who's the perfect pair for an RTL Engineer? The Design Verification Engineer, of course! 🙌🔍 Together, they ensure that every aspect of the SOC design is rigorously tested and verified, making sure it's not just functional, but top-quality. Similarly, they lead a quality life, ensuring that the SOC they create is a reflection of their dedication and expertise. Tag your favorite DVE or RTL engineer! " #DesignVerification #RTLDesign #PerfectPair #SOCQuality

Hey ASIC Verification rockstars! 🚀 We've all been there – staring at the screen at 2 AM, wondering if that elusive bug is real or just a figment of our sleep-deprived imagination. 😴💻 So, let's swap some war stories! 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭'𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐦𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐛𝐮𝐠 𝐲𝐨𝐮'𝐯𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐢𝐧 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐀𝐒𝐈𝐂 𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐣𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐧𝐞𝐲? Was it a sneaky race condition? A timing issue that only showed up once in a blue moon? Or maybe a corner case so rare, it felt like spotting a unicorn? 🦄 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬: 1. 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐚𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐛𝐮𝐠? 2. 𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐝𝐢𝐝 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐢𝐭 𝐝𝐨𝐰𝐧? 3. 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐰𝐚𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 "𝐄𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐤𝐚!" 𝐦𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭? Let's learn from each other's triumphs (and head-scratching moments). Your story might just save a fellow engineer from diving into the debugging rabbit hole! 🕳️🐰 #theartofverification #ASICVerification #DebuggingAdventures #TechTroubleshooting #EngineeringLife

Exciting Opportunity Alert! 🚀 Elevate your digital design skills with our upcoming 10-day training program on Basic SystemVerilog and Test Bench Creation. 🎓💻 🚀 Why Attend? Gain a solid foundation in SystemVerilog Learn industry-best practices for test bench development Practical insights for efficient functional verification 🎓 Who Should Attend? Aspiring ASIC/FPGA engineers Verification engineers looking to enhance their skills Anyone keen on mastering SystemVerilog and test bench creation #SystemVerilog #DigitalDesign #Verification #TrainingProgram #CareerDevelopment #ASIC #FPGA #HardwareDesign

Top 50 Verilog project Github repositories (including gpu/ Risc processors) which you can use physical design project https://lnkd.in/gCrr5Q3H Join Telegram for more updates https://t.me/vlsi_forum 🔬 Explore cutting-edge VLSI technologies and methodologies. 📚 Share knowledge, resources, and best practices. 💬 Engage in discussions on topics like RTL design, physical design, verification, and more. 🌐 Network with fellow VLSI enthusiasts
